name: Supreme Craft Lite VR
description:
Challenge your imagination in this nice block game, build a caste, home, space-ship or anything you imagine.

Play in creative mode with unlimited resources and fly on.

FEATURES:

+ HD quality images

+ online storing of creations

+ cooperative multiplayer construction

+ different texture sets: science fiction, oriental, ancient, steam punk etc

+ accessible from different devices

+ next generation crafting game

+ view your construction using virtual realty cardboard headsets

Click on the screen to place a block, access the inventory to change the active quick menu.

Let's build cool stuff now!
